## ElevationProvider.sampleHeight() method

Samples elevation for a given geo point from the specified displacement map.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
sampleHeight(geoPoint: GeoCoordinates, tileDisplacementMap: TileDisplacementMap): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  geoPoint | [GeoCoordinates](./harp-geoutils.geocoordinates.md) | geo position to query height for. |
|  tileDisplacementMap | [TileDisplacementMap](./harp-mapview.tiledisplacementmap.md) | Displacement map where the height will be sampled. |

<b>Returns:</b>

number

The height at geoPoint.
